quote: 99% of failures come from people who make excuses.
If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leaderr
Whenever you do a thing, act as if all the world were watching.
Any man worth his salt will stick up for what he believes right, but it takes a slightly better man to acknowledge instantly and without reservation that he is in error.
It is easier to do a job right than to explain why you didn't.
Leave nothing for tomorrow which can be done today.
It's amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
Never be satisfied with less than your very best effort. If you strive for the top and miss, you'll still 'beat the pack.
Change will not come if we wait for some other person, or if we wait for some other time.

If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.
When angry, count ten before you speak; if very angry, a hundred
Honor lies in honest toil.
When our memories outweigh our dreams, it is then that we become old.
There’s good in everybody. Boost. Don’t knock.
Be patient and calm; no one can catch a fish with anger.
Failure at some point in your life is inevitable, but giving up is unforgivable.
The advancement and diffusion of knowledge is the only guardian of true liberty.
One man with courage makes a majority
It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
The Chinese use two brush strokes to write the word ‘crisis.’ One brush stroke stands for danger; the other for opportunity. In a crisis, be aware of the danger–but recognize the opportunity.
Change will not come if we wait for some other person, or if we wait for some other time. We are the ones we’ve been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
